author: Luis_Scott
title: Great location, great staff!
text:
Amazing! We enjoyed very much our second stay in New York. The breakfast, the room spacious and clean, the location, the staff, everything is fabulous!
The hotel is near Times Square and MacyÂ´s. From the rooftop you have a good view of Empire States. I would like to thank all the staff, mainly Andrea and Tamon from the front desk. Their work is outstanding!
Room Tip: The rooms in the back and in a high floor have a beautiful view of Empire State Building. See more room tips
